lead_paragraph: The breakup plan of Danaher’s chief executive, Tom Joyce, takes the sting out of his expensive bid for Pall. The $60 billion dentures-to-lasers conglomerate is not cutting enough costs to justify the $13.6 billion it’s offering for the filter maker. But his surprise decision to voluntarily split Danaher in two dangles the prospect of better value for shareholders. The trick is to deliver.

headline.main: Danaher’s Breakup Plan Eases Sting of Big Acquisition
